title: German Language Pack for Office 2013 (x64-x86)
description:
**********************************************
German Language Pack for Office 2013 (x64-x86)
**********************************************

Language packs let you see ribbon or menu items, commands, Help, and proofing tools like the spelling checker, grammar checker, and thesaurus in a translated version of Office for all Office applications.

========
Features
========

- Translates Office user interface: Access, Excel, InfoPath, One Drive Entreprise, OneNote, Outlook, PowerPoint, Project, Publisher, SharePoint Designer, Visio, and Word
- Translates Office Help content
- Includes proofing tools: spelling checker, grammar checker, and thesaurus

=====================
This release includes
=====================

1. Microsoft Office Language Pack 2013 - German
2. Microsoft Project Language Pack 2013 - German
3. Microsoft Visio Language Pack 2013 - German

=====
Notes
=====

- The language pack can be installed over any 64-bit version of Office 2013
- Install: Mount / Unpack and run Setup.exe
- PLEASE KEEP SEEDING FOR A WHILE

====================================================
File: Office 2013 German Language Pack (x64-x86).rar
====================================================
